titles.title: Honoring the sacrifice of members of the Armed Forces who are also mothers and the support provided by mothers of members of the Armed Forces and mothers who are the spouse of members of the Armed Forces.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 5/4/2009--Introduced. Commends the service and honors the sacrifice of approximately 147,000 members of the Armed Forces (members) who are also mothers. Recognizes the support provided by mothers of members and by mothers who are spouses of members. Recognizes the tremendous debt owed for the service, patriotism, and fidelity of military mothers, mothers of members, and military spouses.
